Document.name: HitTestResult
Document.summary: Hit test result for a native window.
Document.enumitem: Border that doesn't contain sizing functionalitiy.
Let the OS window layer decide.
Document.signature: enum HitTestResult { BorderNoSizing, BorderLeft, BorderRight, BorderTop, BorderBottom, BorderLeftTop, BorderRightTop, BorderLeftBottom, BorderRightBottom, Title, ButtonMinimum, ButtonMaximum, ButtonClose, Client, Icon, NoDecision, };
